description.value:
The purpose of this profile is to define a representation of a practitioner role where identifying information is known. The concept supported is a practitioner, in a role, on behalf of an organisation. This profile is intended to support the electronic exchange of health information between healthcare providers, and between healthcare providers and the My Health Record system infrastructure in Australia.
#### Must Support
In the context of this profile [Must Support](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/conformance-rules.html#mustSupport) SHALL be interpreted as follows:
* The system SHALL be able to include the element when authoring a resource where data is available
* The system SHALL be able to store and retrieve the element
* The system SHALL be able to process resources containing the element

short.value: A person with formal responsibility in a role providing one or more services

human.value: The practitioner role shall at least have an identifier with at least a system and a value or a practitioner name

expression.value: practitioner.resolve().name.exists() or practitioner.display.exists() or identifier.where(system.count() + value.count() >1).exists()

human.value: If present, a practitioner shall at least have a reference, an identifier or a display
If present, an organization shall at least have a reference, an identifier or a display

definition.value: Business Identifiers that are specific to a role/location.
